name: What a mess (Tonire)
description:
What a mess

Deal with the filth and stand up to the monster that has us in lockdown

Controls

We recommend playing with a controller!

Controller

Left joystick - Move

A - Attack/Interact

Keyboard:

WASD - Move

Space Bar - Attack/Interact
